subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is not to be confused with visually similar but unrelated {{l|mul|市}} (U+5E02) ''([[market]]; [[trade]]; [[city]])'' which has five strokes and is written {{l|mul|亠}} across the top of {{l|mul|巾}}. Note that the {{w|Ming (typefaces)|Ming typeface}} used in Japan and Korea as well as the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}} uses a vertical dot instead of a slanting {{l|mul|丶}} dot for the top component of {{l|mul|市}} (U+5E02, 5 strokes) and may appear to be similar with {{l|mul|巿}} (U+5DFF, 4 strokes) depending on the font used.
